abstract: Miami Dolphins improbable defeat against Denver Broncos is a revealing signpost in the middle of another lost season in Miami; the once proud and successful team is being drowned by years of personnel mistakes, underachieving players, questionable business decisions and general ineptitude.
snippet: The Dolphins’ improbable defeat against the Broncos and Tim Tebow was a revealing signpost in the middle of another lost season in Miami.
lead_paragraph: The Dolphins’ improbable defeat against the Broncos and Tim Tebow was a revealing signpost in the middle of another lost season in Miami.

headline.main: Dark Days for a Team Adrift
headline.print_headline: Dark Years Unmoor Dolphins From Legacy
headline.seo: Dolphins Are in the Middle of Another Lost Season
